SELECT S_NO , SURVEY_TB.USER_NO , PRO_NO , STITLE , SCONTENT , SCATEGORY , S_CREATE_DATE , S_MODIFY_DATE , SCOUNT , SPARTICIPANT , S_STATUS , USER_ID FROM SURVEY_TB, MEMBER_TB WHERE SURVEY_TB.USER_NO = MEMBER_TB.USER_NO AND S_STATUS= 'Y' ORDER BY S_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SURVEY_TB ( S_NO , USER_NO , PRO_NO , STITLE , SCONTENT , SCATEGORY , S_CREATE_DATE , S_MODIFY_DATE , SCOUNT , SPARTICIPANT , S_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_S_NO.NEXTVAL , #{userNo} , #{prono} , #{stitle} , #{scontent} , #{scategory} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT S_NO , SURVEY_TB.USER_NO , PRO_NO , STITLE , SCONTENT , SCATEGORY , S_CREATE_DATE , S_MODIFY_DATE , SCOUNT , SPARTICIPANT , S_STATUS , USER_ID FROM SURVEY_TB, MEMBER_TB WHERE SURVEY_TB.USER_NO = MEMBER_TB.USER_NO AND S_STATUS= 'Y' AND S_NO = #{s_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE SURVEY_TB SET SCOUNT = SCOUNT + 1 WHERE S_NO = #{s_no}
